titleStmt.title: Sir Thomas Fairfax's letter from Cornwall relating the whole business in the West with the articles at large concluded upon by His Excellencies commissioners and Sir Ralph Hoptons, and an order of both Houses for a day of thanksgiving for the same.
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.
England and Wales. Order of both Houses for a day of thanksgiving.

notesStmt.note: "Die Lunæ, 23 March, 1645. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this letter with the articles shall be forthwith printed and published. J. Brown, Cler. Parliamentorum."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
